entry.content:

entry.title: Big Time Bow Tie
entry.content:
The 'Big Time Bow Tie' comes with one Polka Lav watch face and one Black strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scratch-..
